about_the_game:
eWorlds Original Soundtrack by Hernán Marandino invites you to explore diverse worlds with an eclectic mix of sounds. The soundtrack captures the unique atmospheres of eWorlds, and the players journey through diverse biomes. This carefully crafted score enhances the emotional tension between exploration and competition, adapting to the distinct styles and moods of each level.

Available in high-quality WAV and MP3 formats, the eWorlds Original Soundtrack offers an immersive musical experience that perfectly complements the game's adventurous spirit.

Available in high-quality WAV and MP3 formats, the eWorlds Original Soundtrack offers an immersive musical experience that perfectly complements the game's adventurous spirit.

name: eWorlds Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 300 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for eWorlds, but does not include the base game.
